href.description:
The href of the content that displays now.
Set this at construction if you want to load data externally when the
pane is shown.	(Set preload=true to load it immediately.)
Changing href after creation doesn't have any effect; use attr('href', ...);

extractContent.description:
Extract visible content from inside of <body> .... </body>.
I.e., strip <html> and <head> (and it's contents) from the href

parseOnLoad.description: Parse content and create the widgets, if any.

preventCache.description: Prevent caching of data from href's by appending a timestamp to the href.

preload.description: Force load of data on initialization even if pane is hidden.

refreshOnShow.description: Refresh (re-download) content when pane goes from hidden to shown

errorMessage.description: Message that shows if an error occurs

doLayout.description:
- false - don't adjust size of children
- true - if there is a single visible child widget, set it's size to
however big the ContentPane is

ioArgs.description:
Parameters to pass to xhrGet() request, for example:
	<div dojoType="dijit.layout.ContentPane" href="./bar" ioArgs="{timeout: 500}">

isContainer.description:
Just a flag indicating that this widget will call resize() on
its children.   _LayoutWidget based widgets check for

		if(!this.getParent || !this.getParent()){

and if getParent() returns false because !parent.isContainer,
then they resize themselves on initialization.
